item.title: The Writers’ Strike, AI and a Silly Hollywood Myth
item.description: The Writers’ Strike, AI, and a Silly Hollywood Myth In 2007, Hollywood writers went on strike, shutting down production on many TV shows and movies. The strike was caused by a dispute between the writers and the studios over payment for new media, such as streaming and DVD sales.
